channel.title: Need to change max level Help please?
channel.description: how do i change the max level in ragescape v1 to 125 anyone have any idea?

item.title: Need to change max level Help please?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

If you still need help with this, search for: public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

You will probably see a code like this: [code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
}[/code]

Change for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { To for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 125; lvl++) { And return 99; To return 125;

You might have to change it in your player.java too…I didn’t. If it doesn’t work after doing that, try editing your player.java too.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to change max level Help please?

item.title: Need to change max level Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Open Client.java, press CTRL + F and search for your current total level.

Keep searching until you have something like:

return 99;

Im sorry, Im not home so i cant really show you the code thats there.
But change “99” to whatever level you want, also there’s 1 more 99 or whatever your total level is right now above it, maybe 4-5 lines above it, also change that to what you want the max level to be.

Good luck.

EDIT -

Now that 'Rich posted that code of his, this should be much easier for you.
Search for that, and you’ll find your max level like right next to it.
Change that number and the
return 99;
Numbers.

Read full topic
